definitions.definition: A large capital warship displacing thousands to tens of thousands of tons, heavily armoured and armed with large - caliber guns ; now obsolescent and replaced by smaller vessels with guided missiles .
A non-functional rocket stage , used for configuration and integration tests.
A guessing game played on grid paper ; see Battleship (game) .

main_definition: ( military , nautical ) A large capital warship displacing thousands to tens of thousands of tons, heavily armoured and armed with large - caliber guns ; now obsolescent and replaced by smaller vessels with guided missiles .
secondary_definitions: ( military , nautical , archaic ) A ship of the line .
A non-functional rocket stage , used for configuration and integration tests.
A guessing game played on grid paper ; see Battleship (game) .
